name: Morsenipulator
description:
Created for GMTK 2021

The world's markets are linked by telegram networks.

The faster you can get news, the more you can make off the market. And the fastest way news travels is by telegram.

Still, telegram operators like yourself don't see much of that payment. So when a spiffy looking gentlemen offered to pay you extra to sneak in a code-word or two here or there, well... It's not like your boss understands Morse Code anyway, right?

Inspired by the real life story of Francois and Joseph Blanc, who pulled off the world's first telecommunications scam by bribing France's semaphore operators.

Gabriel Rush - @SpaceBroGabe

Charles Yu -@VoxPopGames
